Tiffany makes a huge mistake one night that leads to disastrous consequences, then she makes an ever greater mistake dealing with it. Now she's dealing with the pain and heartache of that decision.Adam, a policeman, knows what happened to Tiffany, but it goes against everything he stands for. He wants to help, but doesn't really know how.In the meantime, drugs are still being peddled out of both Howard and Calvert Hall. And serious 'accidents' are taking place, with the potential to seriously injure others. Adam's trying, with the help of others, to ferret out the drug pushers, but can't keep his thoughts off Tiffany and the situation she's in.This was a wonderful novel. Connie Almony has written a great second book in her Maryland State University series. All these characters grow on the reader. I found myself looking for one from the last book. I know now there will be more in the series, and I seriously look forward to those!The spiritual lesson I took away was this: no matter what we've done, how far we've gone, God is ready to welcome us home with open arms. He can make even the vilest sinner clean. Not only that, but He makes a person FEEL clean and like they have a purpose to go on living. Great Christian fiction.*I was provided a copy of this book by the author in exchange for my honest review, which I have given.

Carol Moncado just plan knows how to write a great story! This is in her The Montevaro Monarchy series, book 2. This one features Prince Richard, younger brother of soon to be crowned Queen Adeline.Richard loves hiking and signs on to do an outdoor trek with Ellie Brewer as guide. Well, things kinda happen from there, so no spoilers.Will Prince Richard be allowed by the monarchy to pursue the woman he loves or must he remain bound by royal tradition? Richard has a deep trust in God for his life and I found that to be very refreshing.Seriously Carol just writes very well. She creates characters that feel real, their emotions feel real, everything about them pulls the reader in. When I read one of her books, I seriously want to leave everything aside to get that book read! Now! She has a fan for life.I can't wait for the next one.*I was provided a free copy by the author in exchange for my honest review, which I have given.

Retired physician Dr.Richard Mabry has found a wonderful career writing Christian suspense novels. I've read and enjoyed every single one. This one was no different."A gunman who has nothing to lose faces a doctor who could lose it all. When Dr. Mark Baker and Nurse Kelly Atkinson are held hostage by a dangerous gunman, the life of every ER patient is at stake. At the end of the evening, 3 men are dead, including two members of the feared Zeta drug cartel. Though the standoff is over, the killing is not, because when the drug cartel loses its members, revenge is not far behind.When he finds himself under suspicion as a killer yet still a potential victim, Mark turns to an old friend for answers he needs in order to face an adversary whose desires are dark and whose efforts are ruthless. Who is the shooter? Who will the next victim be? And can Mark prove his innocence before the gun turns on him?"Dr. Mabry starts out with a bang in this novel, keeps the conflict going and continues to add layers, making this a suspense novel to make your heart pound with excitement. I love how he continues to add to the mystery, so that every time I think I might know who the culprit is, something happens to change my mind. And he completely surprised me! I had absolutely NO IDEA who the bad guy was. I suspected all the wrong people.Yet another good book from Dr. Richard Mabry. I never miss his novels.*I was provided with a free copy of this book by Abingdon Press in exchange for my honest review, which I have given.

Reading Centralia is like being whisked away by a monster roller coaster and not being able to get off! The ride is amazing, fast and never lets up, all the way to the end of the book!"Peter Ryan wakes up on a typical morning only to find his house empty, his wife and daughter nowhere to be found. His world is shattered after a phone call to a friends confirms the impossible: his wife and daughter died in a car accident he doesn't remember.Haunted by faint memories and flashes of details, Peter becomes convinced that something isn't right and begins to question reality. When he discovers a note in his daughter's handwriting, strange memories begin to surface that cause him to second guess nearly everything he once believed. Suddenly armed men show up at Peter's home, turning the mysterious puzzle of his past into a dangerous game of cat and mouse.On the run and unsure whom to trust, Peter has to discover what's real and what isn't.....before he loses everything."That synopsis alone should be enough to convince you that you must read this book. But in case it doesn't, here's what I have to say: This book is absolutely amazing. Mike Dellosso hits the ground running with this one and the action does not let up one bit throughout the book! Never once. The action and adventure and yes, danger, swirl around the reader pulling you into a vortex of excitement that threatens to consume you until the book is finished.Peter is constantly surprised at everything happening around him because nothing, absolutely NOTHING, is what it seems. How in the world is Peter supposed to find out what is happening when there's no rhyme or reason to anything at all!Centralia is Mike Dellosso's 8th book and I've read every single one and they are terrific. If you enjoy Christian suspense, you MUST get this book. Don't waste anytime grabbing it. But be warned: everything around you must wait until you finish because you will NOT want to put it down!*I was provided a free copy of the book by the author in exchange for my honest review, which I have given.

Mary Connealy at her best! Christian Cowboy Comedies is what she does and she does it very well. This one had a very suspenseful mystery included that keeps the reader guessing.Shannon is the middle Wilde sister, the ones who fought in the Civil War dressed as men. Tucker is a wild mountain man, tracking and hunting for a living. They meet up on the way over a cliff after going over is the only option. That or being eaten by a grizzly bear.No more clues to the rest of the story here. This is a terrific story, filled with Mary Connealy's usual dry sense of humor. I love the woman's work!Interspersed with all the action and humor, we see a wonderful spiritual message that God is in control and cares about everything that concerns us. And He can heal all our wounds, even the ones we let no one see.I can't wait for book three in this series and find out what Bailey Wilde gets herself into!

When these were first advertised on TV, I was skeptical.  Turns out I was right. I saw them at a store for $5.00 and figured I might as well give them a try becaues the price was good.  Now I've used pee pads for my dogs for probably 8 years.  I trained our mini dachshund to one 5 years ago.  He always goes on the pad.This is a worthless product. I've never given anything a 1 star rating. This one doesn't deserve even that.  The dog goes everywhere on the pad EXCEPT the bulls eye that guarantees dogs will pee on the bulls eye!!  Totally worthless. I'm only thankful I didn't buy this when it was first out on the market.If you're looking for a remarkable and awesome pee pad, I can highly recommend the Retriever brand sold by Tractor Supply.  Best I ever used.  Totally works and holds a LOT of pee!Don't waste your money on this junk.

Susan May Warren is one of my all time favorite authors.  I especially love her books set in Deep Haven.  But she writes well anytime she writes!This collection of 3 novellas is a great purchase with great characters and I enjoyed it very much.You can't beat the price, so why not grab this while you can. You won't regret it!

Karen Witemeyer writes great westerns. I've read all her books and this one is her very best.Stone Hammond is the best tracker in Texas. He never comes home empty-handed. So when a wealthy railroad investor hires him to bring home his abducted granddaughter, Stone accepts the latest challenge.Charlotte Atherton, former headmistress of Sullivan's Academy for Exceptional Youths, will do anything to keep her charges safe, especially the orphaned girl entrusted to her care. She promised Lily's mother she'd keep the girl away from her grandfather and nothing will stop her from fulfilling that pledge.But Charlotte didn't count on Stone Hammond. Is he the bad guy? Can she trust him? Even though she's never been able to trust a man before?Stone Hammond has doubts, too, once he meets Charlotte. Is she a victim or a villain?Karen Witemeyer has created a cast of characters that are very likeable and the children are wonderful as well. As is the gnome. (You'll have to read the book to know who he is.) I loved this book. And the action? Wow! I loved it so much. Stone Hammond was a male character that would cause any woman to swoon!The Christian message here is great, too. God has our good in mind, no matter what we think of how we feel. And God has a way of working things out that we think there is no way out of.*I received this book free from the publisher in exchange for my honest review, which I have given.

Heather Gilbert rocks a mystery! Trial By Twelve is the second in her A Murder In The Mountains series featuring Tess Spencer. The first book in the series, Miranda Warning, was so good and I couldn't wait for the second. Now I wish it hadn't ended so soon!Women are turning up dead in the woods behind the new spa in the small WV town of Buckneck. Tess has been working there part time and decides to do a little sleuthing of her own. Well, things just proceed from there, danger comes closer to home and I won't reveal anymore for fear of spoilers.Heather has created characters that seem so real, they are just your own neighbors. I love them all! Nikki Jo, Thomas, Andrew, Petey, Charlotte, I could go on.One other thing Heather does very well indeed and that is craft a tight mystery that is done so well the reader has no clue whatsoever until the very last moment. THEN she throws in ANOTHER surprise you had NO idea was coming! I was gasping every few minutes right at the end. AND...the last sentence blew me away! I can't wait to see if there is another book in this series. There better be! Because Heather left us all hanging by a sharp cliff. Love, love, love her books.*I was given a free copy of this book by the author in exchange for my honest review, which I have given.1 lik
Everything you want is here.  Great graphics, FANTASTIC.animation, great wins and the best super spin features you have ever seen.  Never going to beat this one!!!!

One of the best games ever!!!!  Good graphics, great animation, and. Strategy building all rolled into one.  I hop now they will come out with Germ Heroes Saga, which is Fantastic also.  Thank you King!!!!!

All the Leetcom games are a lot of fun except for one drawback...No auto-spin.  Spartan is great with good payouts and chances to double winnings for 10 min if u watch a very short ad.  Lots of fun and it lets u keep playing.  I want auto spin so I can play, watch, and use my hands for other things.

No auto spin, hard to make any bonuses, pay outs lousy, etc,etc.  It has the makings of a fantastic game, but needs more work.  I hate games without auto play because I like to play when cooking or watching tv or other things so my hands are free.  Sorry great game.  Work harder to fix your games a bit more user friendly.

No auto spin, no decent payouts, only 1 pitiful bonus per day, slow reels.  But it has beautiful graphics.  Sorry, but that's not enough for me.  I would like to play and not wait forever.  Sorry Great World  Games.  You need to do better than this.
If you like lots of ads, teeny tiny pictures, lousy graphics (if u can see them), this is the game for you.  How bad can it get?  Not much else.

Not enough coins given out to play with and hard to understand just how they do dole them out.  Sometimes they're there,  Sometimes they're not.  The games are good and I would play more if they weren't so stingy.

This game has it all; great animation, good and plentiful bonus games, easy to play with auto spin, etc etc...  in other words...YOU WILL LOVE THIS GAME!!!  Wish they gave more coins for playing or at least every hour.  Great game people!!

Getting 400 COINS every 12 hrs is not enough to keep you going long.  I saved for a month to be able to  play for a while.  It pays out ok and is pretty easy to move up, but still it doesn't take long to lose it.probably would play a lot more if it had hourly bonuses.
Another app that does not work...Plus u pay for it .  Believe me...u will not like their terms page either.  mobilebyte...bite yourself where it hurts.
HOW CAN YOU PLAY A GAME WHEN IT SCREWS UP ON THE DOWNLOAD.....3TIMES!!  If you put it out there make sure it works first.  Looked like a good one

This game is so lame it"s pathetic.  You don't win, you cannot build up points as it resets you at $200 each time you go in, no bonuses at all, bad graphics, etc, etc, etc.  Need I say more?  Oh yeah...waste of money for this piece of digital junk.

Not as fun as the first one...Slots of Fortune....Plus the first one did not have ads until I updated it....wrong move...now it has ads that are so distracting, being placed on screen in bad place.  Anyway, this new versions, Slots of Fortune Vegas, falls way short from most of their other games.  I am still waiting for Wild Cherries and Haywire.  Plus they need to get rid of all the ads and add auto play.  I sure hope they are smart enough to do it.  We shall see.....
Doesn't give new games very often...one of my fave games but not enough "newness".  It is past time for new games.hurry up people!!!!

Takes forever to load, freezes,  doesn't give you bonuses, etc, etc, etc.  In other words, this game just does not work.  It sucks.  To bad, too, because it looks great.  Bye bye.  Let us all know when it gets fixed.

When you level up game freezes and then you lose those credits as well as winnings.  Plus if you happen to be in double time. mode, it freezes, you get out, come back and poof....No double time.  Could  be my favorite game if it was working properly. Plus it does not give me the 3hr bonuse credits or extra jackpot credits.PLEASE FIX!!!!!t
I have seen to date.  There is not one thing good I could say about this game.  Out with the garbage!!!!  Deserves a zero minus minus!!

Slots.  Just a kick to play.  Fast moving, easy to understand, but needs better payouts and hourly bonuses insteAd of every 3-4 hrs.  Wish it had an auto play button.  Fun game but will be better fun if you all fix these things.
A little glitchy.  When you level up the screen freezes, then you have to get out and then go back in.  Once this is fixed, we will have another #5.

This and most of the  Leetcom games are must haves for the ultimate, original Vegas experience.  US baby boomers know these games and love them now as much as way back then.  Just make sure you get the full landscape versions.  One thing the developers could have done was add auto-spin to the reels.  Thank you Leetcom for bringing back some very fond memories.  Now Double Wild Cherries and Haywire would just just about make me go to happy land.  Thanks again for the happiness and fun.!!.

I bought these to jazz up my exterior steps leading up to the front door.  Great colour, and I particularly like the leaf pattern, which coordinates nicely with the ivy-like vines growing all over my house.  There are two negatives with them - they don't stay in place all that well, often getting kicked over by shoes... and dirt and debris does stick to them (as I expected).  You have to regularly shake them out or vacuum.  But despite those two drawbacks, I am glad I bought them.  There was a slight polyurethane smell, but that dissipated quickly.  Overall, a nice product.

I am a lover of all things silver and crystal, and since I'm moving to a more contemporary and modern style, I thought I'd try this light.  It's beautiful!  A nice size, about 10", not too small or too large.  I'm buying a second and may use them next to the bed on nightstands.  It would make a great single accent light anywhere too.  Note that this is an accent light, not a task light, though for me I can still see things reasonably well around it.  One star off because the pieces aren't crystal or glass but plastic, but I have a lot of experience with the other and they are a real chore to clean.  This material seems like it will take only a minor dusting every so often.Update:  I've purchased two now because I loved it so much, and I've tried it all over the house.  I like it best when not wide out in the open, but when in a smaller, tighter space, like on a bookshelf in between books/other accessories.  It creates a beautiful pattern against the back wall, which you wouldn't see if it was on top of a shelf.  It is also very nice in a collage of three items, one taller above it.  I'm still enthusiastically recommend this light!  And $45 is an amazing price.

No side effects for me, but it did not keep me asleep all night, which is why I bought it.  Within 30 minutes it did make me sleepy, but I woke up after 3 hrs, got back to sleep eventually, and then woke up two more times throughout the night.  For me, it was not strong at all.  Waste of money.For my husband, who also took one pill, it affected his circulation.  He was cold all night.

I like these packs.  They don't have an odor like some other brands.  But that's a lot of money ($17.09) for salt and baking soda.  I have been using 1/3 tsp table salt for years, as my doctor recommended, and that works just fine, but you have to eye it every time and sometimes it's a bit too much or too little.  I'm giving myself a break now and going back to packets.  But I now see there is another listing for an 8 oz bottle + 40 saline packs, for $17.99 (http://www.amazon.com/Nasopure-System-Kit-Ounce-Bottle/dp/B002N1TOZ6/ref=sr_1_1?s=hpc&ie=UTF8&qid=1426894652&sr=1-1&keywords=nasopure+8+oz+bottle).  Damn.

What's with all these high reviews on this product - are they bogus?  I just got this in the mail, tried it once, and immediately threw it out.  The product was not old or defective in that way, it's just a very poor cream eyeliner.  It does not have the right consistency to get on the brush or your face.  In the pot it looks like a rich dark colour, but in use it seems like it doesn't have a lot of pigment.  Not that sparkly or shimmery.  The brush is a weird shape, elongated not angled, so doesn't work at all.  I used my own.  I expected more.  Waste of money.  e.l.f. is much better in this price point.

Pretty good.  I like the floral/leaf design.  It's 15" which is a size I had a difficult time finding in a decorative bracket (most are much narrower, which limits the size of what you can hang on it).  It's made of cast iron so feels heavy and substantial, not cheap (the main reason I chose it).  I just wish there weren't so many burrs on it.  It seems like it was dipped but not finished off nicely, so up close it has a lot of rough edges/burrs.  You don't see it from far away at all, though, when mounted.  There was no weight limit listed, but it feels strong, though the black screws that came with it could be longer.  We installed it on our porch, into stucco.  It's holding fine so far.

This is my second pen and I now realize how amazing and really useful it is, after not using it for a while and also comparing it to all my other jewelry cleaners.  This pen is super convenient, doesn't damage precious stones or any metals, doesn't stink, is compact and portable.  Best of all, it makes all my gems sparkle, and I just now figured out how to get my emerald cut 14 yr old engagement diamond ring clean - emerald cuts are beautiful but notorious for their later lack of sparkle, unlike more faceted cuts.  I just figured out that the thin yet stiff bristles of this pen fit neatly underneath the emerald mount on all four sides.  You have to get under stones to really clean them, and this brush fits!  I haven't seen my emerald cut sparkle this much since I last took it to the jeweler for resizing and cleaning.  This pen is amazing.And p.s. I have had no problems with them being dried out.  The blue fluid flows nicely and has lasted me quite a while.
Love the density of the foam, but wish they were larger

This piece is absolutely beautiful, especially considering it's just a piece of plastic.  I bought it thinking I could use it either to store makeup brushes or eyeliner pencils, or nail tools like files, or our thin pairs of reading glasses.  It works for the reading glasses (one thin or rimless pair only), but is a bit small for all but the most minimalist makeup user, and I have discovered that sharp things like scissors, letter openers, cuticle trimmers are not ideal, as they will scratch the plastic easily.  It looks good because it is so pristine, and I'd like it to stay that way.  So I'm going to store it away for now, until I find just the right use for it.  I think that may entail buying another one, facing them back to back, and then storing makeup in them.  I would advise one to think carefully about what one stores in it, as it is narrow and prone to scratching, but as far as looks goes, this is the most beautiful acrylic piece of its kind that I have ever seen.  Love the base and crisp corners.  It looks fantastic on a white office desk.  This is an item for a true minimalist.

Works great, 6+ years and still ticking.  Not one complaint.  Affordable.  Easy to install under cabinet.  Great product.  If you like the look and stainless steel finish, I can't imagine why you wouldn't be happy with it.

These jeans fit comfortably, are basically true to size in the waist/hip/butt (or a little large), but wow the leg is wide.  All the way down.  They truly are a trouser jean.  I have never had on jeans this wide or large.  Interesting cut.  I considered keeping them because they are so unusual, so comfortable, and mostly because the denim is super inky dark beautiful blue and incredibly comfortable (the fabric is incredibly soft).  But I think they're just too wide, especially for today's skinny jean world.  Someone will love these, but most will find them too wide.I'm impressed with the denim material combo though, so will be looking at the Liverpool brand in the future.

This is a great scrub brush.  I use it in the kitchen for pots and to clean the stainless sink.  The bristles are stiff and it lasts a long time.  The head has a straight edge, which, when flipped over, is very useful for scraping surfaces.  I put it in the dishwasher utensil rack often to sterilize it, and this never has any adverse effects like melting.  This Chinese company sells more than one colour of these.  This "magenta" is not magenta, technically, but more of an orangey-red.  Shipping is not super fast, if you are in a hurry which I don't know why you would be - who has scrub  brush emergencies - but the items always do arrive well before the estimate.  I would highly recommend this brush and the uxcell seller.

Bought these as a gift for my husband and he loves them.  He loves them so much, he won't even wear them.  I thought they were hiking boots that would also look good worn in an urban setting.  But he doesn't want to get them dirty hiking, they're that nice.  And they're a discontinued item.  Cole Haan Nike Air shoes are extremely comfortable, he wears almost nothing else.  Very well-cushioned, even for long distances.  These are extremely well made, look sharp, and are a great crossover from country to city wear.

I am a little shocked at the 5/5 reviews.  This looks a little cheap to me.  The sunflower design is pretty, and the colour is a nice dark cool brown, but I do not like how the pushbutton stays permanently lit an orangey-yellow, and in my case ever since the day of installation, I see speckles inside of the button (is mine flawed, or all they all like this?), which cheapens it.  I only paid about $30 so maybe I expected too much for the price.  This does not improve the curb appeal, it cheapens it.  I would not buy again.

I did not like this bowl, personally, but I think it all depends on what you are looking for/needing.  I wanted a fine-rimmed, relatively lightweight bowl that I can eat 1-2 person salads from, mostly.  Large enough for tossing salads, but not so large that you have to eat from a separate smaller bowl.  This was not it.  This bowl is very heavy, substantial, but not in a fine or delicate way the way that crystal is.  The glass is thick and it looks as if it is made for heavy use, serving on a dining table, and something which you don't have to be careful around.  I've tried other Luigi Bormioli glass products, and they are not that nice.  Don't let the nice-sounding Italian name fool you.  They are basic, utilitarian items.

This is a great bowl.  Got it on Amazon long ago for an amazing price (it's much higher now).  I use it every week once or twice, mostly for salads for one or two people.  It's beautiful and has been durable.  Unfortunately today I accidentally slammed it down upside down on the corner of the kitchen sink and stone countertop, and I chipped it.  It was totally my fault, and in no way speaks to the durability of the bowl (except, of course for the fact that it is glass and not plastic).  Wish I had bought a bunch more.  It's well worth buying and a great item, especially for those who collect millefiori items, like I do.

I find most detanglers work well and are not that much different from one another.  I buy them often based on the smell.  I love this stuff.  This is my second bottle.  It works great on my fine blonde hair.  Don't use too much on the scalp, just enough to get rid of tangles created by the showerhead.

Flattering and versatile style, comfy, pretty well cushioned, laces are very adjustable and can accommodate many different calf sizes and pant legs (my favorite feature of them), or be made tighter for leggings, etc.  Fairly flexible rubber sole, main areas of the boot are genuine suede, though not of a top quality.  My only issue with this boot is it is narrow in the front, at the point where a separate panel is stitched on, just down from the toes.  But since they're suede, I'm hoping they'll stretch out a bit over time.  I had to exchange for the next half size up (I fit 8 1/2 or 9, depending) and they (the 9) are still a tad snug in the width.

This black binder is large and has big capacity, but I don't like it for the reason that the cover is so cheap and plasticy.  The black would be okay, but they cover it with a layer of sort-of clear plastic, which scratches easily and arrived already scuffed up.  Both I ordered look this way.  They look like the typical, cheap, run-of-the-mill binder you would find leftover at Staples.  Had I seen them in person, I would have kept looking.The rings are metal, not plastic, and seem strong and like they would not easily become misaligned.There are two pockets, one on each cover side.The front and back do not fold, like some binders.  It is somewhat heavy.  I prefer those that are flexible and lighter.

I ordered the navy and they were great (see my other review), but these "burgundy" are not red but rather more purple.  Incandescent lights makes them look red in photos, but in natural light, they're not red at all.

Drop Dead Punk by Rich Zahradnik gives you the feeling of being in New York City during the financial crisis of 1975 when the city was on the verge of bankruptcy. The details really make this book shine. Even though this is the second book in a series, it works very well as a standalone. I love the fact that the author was a reporter in many kinds of media but because he had reported for newspapers, the book felt very realistic.The main character, Coleridge Taylor enjoys his life as a crime reporter and had allowed himself total immersion in his job after a break up with a girlfriend. He was trying to fill a big hole, he knew something was missing in his life but his job came closer than anything to filling that hole.Coleridge was sort of a depressed fellow, everyone at the office knew that the paper that he worked for was ready to fold, and they just didn‚Äôt know when it would happen. He is not the right person to spend his time at City Hall to wait for a reaction from the mayor about President Ford‚Äôs declaration that New York City would not be offered help to save them from bankruptcy. He was bored by that kind of stuff.One thing that was very endearing to me was that Coleridge felt emotional pain but also at times a lot of physical pain. That made me realize that usually male leads in crime mysteries do not complain about physical pain. This one little fact made me fall for this character. He sort of brought out the mother in me!Even he was supposed to spend the day at City Hall, Coleridge called a contact up and got a lead on a crime story. He managed to be at the crime scene at the same time that the investigators were there. He noticed that the policeman had been shot in the face and it would have been almost impossible for the young punk haired man to have shot him. Things don‚Äôt fit. Something smells about this case. The more he checks things out the more that they don‚Äôt fit. Coleridge makes a new friend a badgered female newbie on the force. It took a long time for them to be able to trust each other but they learned how. She would a great character to continue in a third book.The book kept my interest all the way through, I stayed up to midnight finishing it. I did not have an idea about how it would end. One thing that I was positive of and that was that I was on Coleridge Taylor‚Äôs side! I would love to read the next book in this series.I received a finished copy of Drop Dead Punk in exchange for a fair review from the Partners in Crime but that in no way influenced my thoughts or feelings in my revie

I have long baby fine hair that tends to get oily.  It also tends to look limp. I only have waves if I put them in with a curling iron. I threw my last one aways because I kept getting burned on my neck. So my goal is has changed to adding fullness, feeling clean and having some shine.The smell is light and went away quickly. There were lots of suds, next time, I will use less because it took a while to get all the suds out of my hair.My hair has much more fullness, feels light and clean. It also shines. So I think this shampoo is great for baby fine hair, waves or no waves. I did a double take at the price. 25 ounces is a lot of shampoo for that price!

I thought maybe this would be OK when I sent off for it but it is not for me. When I opened the box, before I even opened the package, the Dawn smell was super strong. I had to back up. I took a roll out and quickly put the other one in the cabinet. Now the whole kitchen cabinet will smell like Dawn!I tried one sheet, ran some water over it and it instantly produced suds. OK so far, so I cleaned my kitchen counter top and was surprised about the amount of suds. Then I had to wet another plain paper towel to get rid of the suds. I think there just too many suds for my liking. I put the roll of Dawn infused towels back into the cabinet. We use the dishwasher to clean our dishes so I am not sure what to use them for, our bathtub requires heavy duty cleaner because of the stains from the water. Disappointed but I am hopeful for the next invention.

This is a puzzling book to review! I definitely want to read more of Ace Collins‚Äô books after finishing The Color of Justice about a half hour ago. The author kept my attention and I enjoyed the characters although they were a wee bit stereotyped.  It is a story set in a small town, Justice, Mississippi, mostly in 1964.  I can remember that time period very well and I think that he captured the feelings of the times very well. The town was divided into black and white. I grew up in the North but I remember going to a school for whites and I later discovered that there was also a school for blacks. It brought back memories for me. I am glad that Ace Collins knew how to trigger those memories.The lawyer in this tale Coop Lindsey, had to go through some uncomfortable soul searching before he decided to take on defending a young black teenager who had been charged with murder of a young white woman in town. I liked the way the author tied Coop‚Äôs upbringing by his preacher father to his decision to risk being hated by the town‚Äôs white population.  This book had a ‚Äúmovie‚Äù quality to it and it was easy for me to imagine Kevin Costner playing Coop Lindsey.I love the character of Hattie, although also stereotyped, the boy‚Äôs aunt who pleads for his chance to have fair trial. I think I felt at home with these people and recognized good qualities of my old relatives in them. But the town‚Äôs name of Justice seemed to be a little too much when a major theme in this book is in fact Justice!Also, I did not like how things fit together a little too neatly at the end. But on the whole, I enjoyed this book and think the author might have been better off in not tying up all the ends. That would be more like life, having some secrets that never are discovered but effect the character‚Äôs peace of mind.

My husband love the scent of this soap. He also loves the Axe product scents. He tried it out for the first time tonight and loves it. It moisturizers instead of dries the skin. The shape of the bar is curved so it fits his hands better than the plain rectangles.It is densely packed so it will last through many showers and it was easy for him to get a lather.So there really wasn't anything negative to report.

It is strong. I followed the directions and put it on last night and it is still going strong. It is in the 100s this week in Texas so I really do need it. When it is hot, I sweat a lot and the smell is not good.I had two problems with it. It has a baby powder scent which is slightly overwhelming. I have never liked that smell so I when I buy, this I definitely will try a different scent. Secondly, it was difficult for me to get the the creamy stuff to start to come out. At first, I tried turning the wheel clockwise, nothing happened, then I went counter-clockwise. After a lot of turnings back and forth a little started to come out. I was worried that something was not connected so I could not use it. But I went on-line and found another review that indicated the same problem. OK, so it was not broken. I continued to turn it back and forth. Finally, it came out.The product works very well, I just don't favor the smell and wonder if they could have made it easier to get it started.

This is a great notebook with a lot of helpful features. I remember when I was in college. I always looked for 150 pages, college ruled divided notebooks. Now I use them for projects and notes on a book that I will be reviewing.When hunting for a notebook, I also spent time debating on which ones would have the spiral binder that would later snag my sweaters. Hated that! Now Five Star has solved that problem with material covering the spiral on the side so it is impossible to snap. There is a 3" by 1" space where you could put your name with a black marker pen. Also on the side there is a handy loop where you can put your pen so you are all ready to go when you get to class.Another thing that used to irritate me is that I would take lots of notes for some classes and less for others so I had to use paper that was beyond the divider. That problem is gone now. I watch the video at the top to see how to remove them. When I received this notebook, the first thing I did was to take out the first divider. It was as easy as in the video. Putting them back, I had to learn to skip the first loop of the spiral and the divider went in quickly.Each divider has a 3/4 pocket on each side of it so you can hold lots of notes, class outlines and whatever else you accumulate.

My eyes are poor so I struggled against the very small print to read a fascinating book of lessons that men coming from Jordan Downs in Watts taught themselves. This book pulled me into the world of the men of Watts and would not let me go. Each chapter seems like an intimate group therapy session as the men worked hard to define what a good father was and how to keep their children from making the mistakes that they had made.Years ago, the author stayed in her uncle‚Äôs home and they watched Watts burn and being looted. Her uncle taught her about the system being against them and that the riots were expected. Many years later, Jorja Leap and Big Mike Cummings co-lead the original group of Project Fatherhood. The men signing up could get gift cards and information on how to parent.Not having a father was the norm in this area. The men asked themselves, how could they know how to be a father without ever having one? As many sad stories of neglect, absent fathers, and child abuse poured out, the men were challenged to find out what being a good father means. And it was very difficult so they had to help each other. They had to learn to trust each other and to feel that they were fathers in group.The author had to learn their lingo and also realize that their mores were different. She had to push them to help themselves.This book is very inspiring, it shows that together, even there were no best solutions to the problems, the group could work together to find alternatives that would work better than those tried before.I highly recommend this book to anyone interested in what makes a good father and how difficult the problems are when living in a poor area without job opportunities and enormous challenges every day.I received a finished copy from the publishers as a win from LibraryThing in exchange for a fair review. That in no way influenced my thoughts or feelings in this review.

I love the Glad ForceFlex Tall Kitchen Bags that we have been using since they first came out. Our trash seems to be mostly paper and thin plastic (water bottles) so none of it is very heavy. So what we need is a bag that will hold a large quantity of trash but not necessarily heavy trash. We used to recycle the empty plastic bottles and metal drink cans but there is no way that we can do that where we now live. Anyway, this bad is exactly the right size for use.I like force flex crinkly texture. It is always easy to sneak in one last bit of trash after the drawstring has already been tied because it stretches. I noticed that the drawstring also has the same kind of crinkly texture. Unfortunately, I don't have enough trash to try out the drawstring yet. But the bags without the textured drawstring are a bit slippery so that should help holding onto it,The main improvement though is the odor shield. We live in Texas and next week we will hahve over 100 heat next week. Now imagine what it is going to smell like when that trash bad is placed outside our apartment door! I can remember walking down the hallway and holding my nose!

The smell is wonderful. I have always loved the scent of ripe mandarin oranges, they remind me of Christmas. My mother used to keep a bowl of them on the kitchen table for snacking. There is also a faint smell of tiare flower in there too. Dove have always been my favorite bath wash and I was excited to be allowed to try this one.After showering, my skin felt moisturized. I have extremely dry skin so that really helps. The scent goes away after you shower but when you first open the flip top lid, you instantly smell the mandarin oranges. It is true aroma therapy.The price is great and if comes in a big 22 ounce bottle.My only question is why they had to add yellow #5 coloring to it. The smell is enough, I think we don't need the coloring.

I don't have a baby in the house but I do have loads of allergies. I have shampooed my hair and rinsed and later looked in the mirror and saw hives covering my whole face. So, I am reviewing for the non-baby segment of bath wash users. The first thing that I noticed about the description ‚ÄúNatural, allergy free‚Äù. That is not to say that you may be allergic to something that is natural but at least this bath wash avoids the most common culprits in bath washes. I did not break out after using it!I like idea that it does not have color added to it. The smell is great, lavender. I also love the shape of the bottle. It fits great into my small hands and it is very easy to open and shut the lid.The only negative is that it is expensive. I have noticed when something first comes out and is very expensive, the price sometimes adjusts so don‚Äôt mark this off the list. Just watch the price.

We use these mainly for getting our hands very clean before eating. We have a very small, dark kitchen and it is hard to even see your hands so it is great to grab one and get completely clean. I also love them for long trips in the car. They are gentle enough for your face too. I even cleaned my computer screen and keyboard with them.When you start a new one canister of them, just open the lid and pull it through the slit so that you can pull them out one at a time. Don't know why but I like the clean and the citrus scent better than the unscented one.The instructions say to throw the used wipe in the trash, don't flush them.

We received this tube-free toilet paper this afternoon. I never thought it could be sold without the tube. When I was in grade school we used to collect the tube and make something that looked like a candle for the holidays but usually I can never think of another way to recycle them. So this is a great idea. Less waste for us to throw away. We live in apartment and we don't want to be embarrassed by the size of our trash bag!  The package says that it is 40% recycled paper so I love that.The paper itself is thicker than the other Scott toilet paper that we still have. It is embossed with a design and grooves. It is only one ply but it doesn't need to have more. It is strong and will do the job very well. It is shorter across but will last a lot longer than rolls from Dollar type stores. It is white so there is no color added and no scent added so that is safer. It is also very absorbent.One thing I noticed is that it is not as soft as regular Scott do I would still buy some Cottonelle or Angel Soft if I am prepping for a colonoscopy when you really need extra softness.  Also the package is two rolls wide which is too wide for our storage in our bathrooms. Would have liked it a little better if it was only one roll thick.

One tablet works for two months although my husband says it actually works for three! We have hard water which really stains the toilet bowl. Also it works great as a deodorizer.Now the cautions: Be careful to cut the packet with scissors and do not touch the tablet. It is loaded with bleach. Drop it into the largest empty part of the tank. Do not stand over it and breathe in the odor!Store the tablets in a place where children cannot get into it. Keep the seat lid down to protect your pets from breathing or drinking the water in the bowl. We have two pet birds who sleep in one of the bathrooms so we make sure to keep the lip down always.

This is the only brand that I buy. I tried a store brand one time but I missed the lovely woodsy smell. I like to use it in restaurants before eating. Hate to go to the bathroom and then open the door when my momentarily clean hands.I love it for getting ink off my fingers too. I found that out by accident. I just used some on a tissue and rubbed and off it came. It is also great for cleaning the handle bar of grocery carts. This morning I was tried get a box of sanitary wipes open before I went in to the store and couldn't get the lid to budge. Before cell phones were everywhere I used it to clean my land line phone.I keep one bottle on my desk all the time. A little bit does the job so one bottle lasts a long time.

My husband love this. It smells great, cedar and grapefruit are wonderful together. Also his skin felt moisturized. He does have dry skin that he needs this. And he was excited that he could wash his wait with it too. He is very tradtional and has used bar soap for years and this hair and body wash has sold him! I was a little surprised how much he liked it!!For me, the best part is the smell, He smells so good!!

This Curel Itch Defense Body Wash is great. I have very dry skin and the worst part is my upper back and the tops of my arms. I applied a little bit to my bath sponge and rinsed and now I feel moisturized. The only place that I need some lotion is on my arms. Everywhere else, I don't itch!My favorite thing about this product is that it has no smell. It is always iffy if your will like the smell when buying a body wash so with no scent is a real winner. I also love that it does not have soap in it. Soap tends to dry out skin.

This is a Rhodium Plated Sterling Silver Cushion Shape Cubic Zirconia 7mm Pendant Necklace. I have never had a zirconia anything before. I love diamonds so anything that is similar is great with me.It is hard to judge the size by the picture, this is a dainty necklace. I measured the stone as being 1/4 " by 1/4".  The chain is extremely delicate so I wouldn't to test the strength. Also the closure part is difficult to open and close if you have arthritis because it is so small. It does look fragile.I don't think I would keep it in the box that it came in but maybe a velvet pouch instead so that the chain does not get tangled with chains of other necklace.

This is a great stylish planner. I wish I had this before I retired. The black cover and the heft make it so professional looking. In size it is just a little shorter than letter size computer paper and just a little narrower.It has an expanding pocket in the back where can store papers and a bungee cord to hold it shut when not in use. The paper is very good quality and there are places built in for notes. On the monthly calendar there is a lined column for notes and on the weekly calendar, two lines available for writing for each hour starting at seven and ending with 6. Also a lined column to the right for more notes.It even smells good. This is a little piece of luxury to make

I love the styling. I consider my legs to be stocky but they look slim in these pants. I have had Lee's relaxed fit before and they are best fitting for my body type. I am 5'3" and the legs are just a tad too long for me but will be fine when I wear shoes.The color is more like a dark brown than a roasted chestnut. They are also easy to care for and are 98% cotton with and 2 % spandex. When I wear them, I feel spiffy!

These are very different from the vintage kitchen dish towels that I practiced my first embroidery on when I was a child. They do not need any decoration in fact they will make your kitchen prettier. The dish towels are much prettier when you see them in person than in the picture because then you can see the details.Just throw them into the washer and maybe use a light iron. They would be the best dish towels to have out when company comes.  Or don‚Äôt iron them if there is no company coming! They are much bigger than I am used too but that is good because if one part of the towel gets too wet, just use a different part.Also on the reverse side on one of the top corners is a bad that you can use for handing it up. They are very soft and much heavier than the old fashioned dish towels.This set would make a great house warming gift.

This is something that I long, for a little piece of luxury but I usually don't buy it for myself.  It would make an excellent gift for any woman. When you open the package, you get the fragrance of old fashioned roses. The soap is 5.2 ounces so it will last a long time if you reserve it for long soothing baths. The bar is pink with bits of rose petals peeking out. Even the package is pretty.

It is my mistake for not realizing that it would be difficult to find a pillow that is square and big to fit the print pillowcases in the picture. There are pluses and minuses to this Bed in a Bag. I have bought a Bed in a Bag before but the while sheets and white pillow cases are made of very thin material. I was very disappointed in thinness of the fabric.The two square print pillow case are made of thicker material like what I expected for the white ones.But the comforter is very warm and inviting. I was surprised at how big it was. I don't think it would fit anything smaller than a queen sized bed.The set includes:2 white standard sized pillow cases2 print square shaped big pillow cases1 white fitted sheet1 white flat sheet1 large print comforterThe comforter was better than I was expecting but everything in the above list that was white was so thin and I am not expecting them to last very long.

I have never bought adult diapers. I just wanted to see how they compare to the disposable underpants for women.  I have had some nerve damage that is making my incontinence problem worse. These are definitely diapers only much bigger. The first thing that I noticed is that the tabs which do stick and can be re-stuck are rather tiny for someone who has arthritis or the caretaker who has arthritis. Also, these are much more bulky. So if you are going to take them with you on a plane, count on them taking up a lot of your suitcase.They are made in America, I do like that. I do think it is time to start asking people who have to wear them what they want. They are very hard to put on compared to the pull on briefs. Also, these are uncomfortably hot. Feels like wearing a plastic although cushioned bag. They had me sweating in about tens. That is not good. The paper is not breathable and will be causing a lot of people who have to wear them rashes and possibly skin infections. That wasn't a problem with the ultra-comfortable pull on briefs.One plus is that they prevent odor and they did not add a scent which could create problems with the heat. So they don't smell.The pull on briefs are a much more suitable solution to incontinence as long as you can still put on the pull-on briefs go with them. I also think that type of material that this is made above is less absorbent. The briefs pull the liquid away from and are less likely to cause a urinary infection.I really think that with the retention of heat and possible skin irritations, whoever wears them will not be a happy camper.

Great mechanical pencils with a lttle bit thicker lead than usual. They are colorful and comfortable to hold. I didn't notice anything rubberized to add comfort but instead of round they are triangular in shape. They come with extra leads but I am ordering more. Hate to run out of leads. To install the lead, take off the eraser top, drop in a lead and snap the top back in. Click to get the lead started. The colors add fun to your world!

With the odor protection technology that this company has employed, there is no odor. Besides that I am glad that they did not add a floral smell cover-up too. I tried them yesterday and they are a notch and a half better than the ones that I just ordered. Always Maximum are a little cheaper but these last longer and protect better. Also with them, you get 39 in a pack instead of 48.I love these. I also love the fact that you can order a big batch of them and not have to worry about running out; When will people stop giving stares when you buy these? That is another reason why I like to order them from Amazon. We, who have this problem don't wish for it! It just is what it is!

OK, I have always wanted scented markers of my own after a friend showed them to me! I looked everywhere and couldn't find them. Finally have my own box of delights. The chisel point is great for printing and making narrow lines. The box that it came it is a great way to store them. I am 69 years old but these are also great for children. They are non-toxic and wash off easily. If you are like me, you get carried away sometimes and make a stray mark on your hand or arm. I tested it. I made an orange mark on my hand it was gone in an instant when I ran water over it.I went through all of the different markers smelling them. I love the grape, cherry, apple, mint, and licorice but don't care for the scent of the wild blackberry (light blue) and banana (yellow). I couldn't smell the chocolate. Going to have some fun. I ordered an adult coloring book with pictures for mediation and relaxation. Can't wait for it to come to try out my new markers.

Jergens Wet Skin Moisturizer Oil, Monoi breaks the habit of drying with a towel after a shower and then applying moisturizer.I tried it this afternoon. It didn‚Äôt take much of a squeeze of the bottle to get out enough so squeeze gently. It looks white foam, then spread it around wherever you want the moisturizer. The smell of the oil is wonderful!  It is a delicate coconut and light gardenia smell. It has been an hour since I applied it and all of the moisture is still retained and the wonderful smell is too. Just be careful to not apply it to any place where you have an open sore. It is not meant to be used for that.I am very happy with this product and will keep it handy in my shower

Athletec Sports Ultra Absorbent Yoga Towel Set, Purple is larger than I had pictured, 12 inches by 70 inches. I love the color and the material is very absorbent. The best part is the reverse side where there are lots of plastic or rubber like grippers to hold the towel in place.I have not done Yoga yet but I love this towel for floor exercises. It is plenty big and stays put.  Nothing is as bad as the towel slipping around or bunching up under you so that you end up with very little towel underneath you. The face clothe is great for wiping the sweat off of your face.The material is very soft to your skin.

The Skullcandy Grind Headphone with Mic is wonderful. Gives you the full experience of the music. I heard parts that I never heard before with this set of headphones! I love the tap tech feature. Sometimes hearing the track once is just not enough and other times you want to skip one.The headphones are very comfortable. They are not as heavy as some others that I have and there is cushy foam that covers the underside of the span.The sound does pull the bass to the forefront but I love bass!The only thing that I could wish for is a longer electric cord for when I plug it into my boom box. It is plenty long for use with a laptop.

For the amount and the cost of Minor's Teriyaki Sauce is an excellent buy.The main drawback to me is that it tastes too sweet. It only has 7 grams of sugar but when I taste it the sugar what I first taste. I think the recipe could be greatly improved with half the brown sugar and more onion powder and the addition of other spices to bring out the flavor. With those changes, I think that more would be sold. To me this is a westernized sauce by that I mean it has too much sweetness and not enough zing!There are multiple uses for me, especially when I add some Asian spices to it. I am a vegetarian so it would be great to baste tofu and vegetarian meat products with it. And of course veggies burgers, there are so many different kinds, would have more flavor with it.

The Last Witness by Jerry Amernic was inspired by the time he saw the numbers on the arm of a woman at a Jewish Bakery that his father used to take him to as a child. I was older when I first saw the tattoo of numbers on a man‚Äôs arm. Having read many books about the Holocaust, I always wonder about how is it possible that there are still survivors of those who were in death camps. Jerry Amernic provides one of the best answer.Jack Fischer aka Jacob Klukowsky is the vehicle for that answer. At the beginning of the book he is 100 years old and believed to be the last survivor of the Holocaust. Why is this book set in the future? The author can see signs that the Holocaust is being forgotten or diminished in its importance. One thing that this book brings up that is different from many books on the Holocaust is that recognizes that the Nazis forced many into ghettos. Jacob was only four years old living in a closed ghetto (walled off from the rest of Lodz, Poland. There was overcrowding, disease and hunger. This was the stage before the death camps. Jerry Amernic flashes back and forth from different points in Jack‚Äôs life and to 2035 in New York City with great ease.Jack Fischer‚Äôs great granddaughter, Christine, a school teacher with a love for history is shocked with the trend to cover less and less of the Holocaust in the textbooks. Jack had not told his children of what his life had been like but he shared what happened with his great granddaughter. She fights to get the full history in the school books.This book does have some mystery which becomes more apparent at the end but I think it is more of a crossover book with historical fiction. This book makes you think. When I was growing up, we heard nothing about the Holocaust. It was my father who brought me the book by Anne Frank that introduced me to the subject. Also, we need to think about recognizing all genocide, about what we can do to prevent it. We need to think about what leads to it, racial slurs, putting down people who are different from the majority, to not really listening to people who are verbally threatening others because they need to be prevented from action.I received an Advance copy of The Last Witness by Jerry Amernic in exchange for a fair review from the Partners in Crime but that in no way influenced my thoughts or feelings in my review.

The Zwilling J.A. Henckels Nail Clipper is a replacement for my old nail clippers. I am surprised at how sharp they are. I was so used to my old pair of nail clippers that I didn‚Äôt realize that they were dull. I love that is not curved so much as my old clippers. Also, I have arthritis and I found them very easy to hold and clip.What I like the best is the little box that the clippers sit in. I found that you really need to hold the clippers at an angle for it to catch all the clippings. But since I have always hated hunting for the clippings that is a big improvement over a standard pair of clippers.Overall, I am very satisfied with this nail clipper.

The AHAVA Dead Sea Water Mineral Hand Cream is so soothing. I really like the feeling of the hand cream. The tips of my fingers were very rough and now they are smooth. It has a little bit of fragrance but is not overpowering. I can‚Äôt smell it unless I put my hand up to my nose. My husband get very dry and cracked hands in the winter and this will be perfect for him. Much better than putting band aids on all the painful areas.This hand cream does cost more than others that I have tried before but I used just a tiny bit and that was enough to do the job. The size is right for a woman‚Äôs purse or to keep in a desk drawer.

This is my first outdoor thermometer, the Taylor 6700GR Big and Bold Dial Thermometer, 13.25", Green. The color is very soothing and it is very light weight.After it was delivered, I immediately took it to the hallway one which is so small that my eyes cross when I read it. The temperature matched!  I have glaucoma so the large numbers are a great comfort for me. We live in Texas so I basically want to know if it is 100 degrees or more. If it is, I am staying in. So it suits my purpose perfectly.

Devil Eye by Rebecca Jean Downey is one of the most exciting and amazing thriller books that I have read!There were times that I held onto the book so hard while immersed in reading about the dangerous situations. In one of those times, there are many, I had to laugh out loud because, as I was reading the character was also gripping something hard at the same time. I have never had that happen before!The story starts with a U.S. Marshall asking Penny Larkin to help stop a sale of guns going to Mexico. S She is supposed find Juan Rico who got mixed up in the Mexican cartel‚Äôs gunrunning. She has to keep the mission secret even from her boyfriend, Leo Tellez, El Paso County Sheriff.Penny has remote viewing skills. She can study objects, pictures and videos to get a mental image. And that gives her information that she needs for tracking. She also has so much determination and moxie that you cannot help but admire her. The writing is so vivid that I felt like I was right there with her all the time. It was very easy to imagine her and worry about her. The author uses all the senses to make it easy to feel that you are with the characters, even down to the sweat under their clothes.This book has a little bit of a paranormal twist and I usually don‚Äôt feel comfortable with paranormal books but it was played up that much so please still consider reading it if paranormal is not your genre.The situations are a reflection of the research that the author did about a similar thing that happened in a small town in New Mexico. The author refers that in her Introduction and gives some background information about the history of gunrunning between the U.S. and Mexico.I learned so much about gunrunning and cartels that felt that I had almost experienced it first-hand.Not only do I look forward to her next book but I can hardly wait for more.I received a copy of Devil Eye by Rebecca Jean Downey in exchange for a fair review from the Partners in Crime but that in no way influenced my thoughts or feelings in my review

Bic Soleil Bella 4 Blade Disposable Razor for Women is my favorite women‚Äôs shaver.  It is much more comfortable to hold that the pink plastic competitors.  It has a spongy white area to put your index finger and it the handle is perfectly shaped to fit your hand. It has a white rubber grip that is also comfortable.  In between the 4 blades there is a moisture strip enriched with coconut milk. It is not necessary to use a shaving foam or gel when you shave your legs.The head of the razor moves around instead of staying straight as you use it. Bic also has a statement on the paper insert that says that if you are not fully satisfied that you can return the razors for a replacement.  It is cheaper than the Venus razors that I used to buy.

I really wanted to try this out because it says "pure" instead of imitation almond extract. I do have a small bottle of one ounce of Durkee Imitation Almond Extract to compare it with. The McCormick Pure Almond Extract is 8 ounces and the other is only one ounce. Unfortunately, I do not remember how much the imitation cost.The ingredients are similar except that the Durkee had imitation almond oil in it. Neither one has sugar or corn sugar in them. But when I smell them, the imitation smells more like cherries than almonds and the McCormick smells more like almonds.I added a little of McCormick Almond Extract to my cherry protein shake for a bit of almond flavor. It was very tasty. I had made one before without the extract with the protein powder, frozen cherries and almond mild and three ice cubes. There was a difference! This one had more almond flavor. I can hardly wait to use them in my Greek cookies.This is a good buy for a lot of pure almond extract and it will taste like almonds!

My brother is a severely autistic adult who lives in a group home out of state. Even though he needs a great deal of supervision there are certain things that bring joy to him. Taking care of his hair, and showering and getting ready in the morning is one of the things that he takes pride in. I buy gifts for his birthday and Christmas and cards throughout the year. I picked this for my husband as a test drive to see if it would do for a gift for my brother. I usually send a group of gifts and it is great to get a package of three things at once. That way he will have a bigger group of things to open. He will also have more of his small monthly spending money leftover if he doesn't have to buy the basics.The deodorant, shampoo with conditioner and body and face wash all have a strong smell with you open them. But the smell seems to go away. I know my brother will be delighted with the smell any way as it will make him feel manly. Both my husband and my brother have dry skin and hair. The shampoo and the body wash both moisturize so that is great.So this gift pack passes the test with flying colors and when my brother's birthday comes up, I will purchase this gift pack for him. In the meantime, my husband can enjoy this one.

I have always used Hefty Extra Strong Bags for left collection. They are large enough to hold a lot of leaves. My mother used them before I did, so I just copied her. Now that I have sold my house, I don't need them for yard work anymore but for cardboard boxes that I fold up and sometimes tear up. We order a lot from Amazon so we accumulate all sorts of boxes through the week. That is too much to put out for the twice a week trash collection.They are strong enough to hold most trash but I would not put broken glass in them. No matter how strong they are, broken glass manages to cut through the bags.  The best solution for that problem is to put broken glass in a cardboard box, seal it well and then put in the bag. The drawstring ties work for me. I hate the cheap twist ties that come with cheaper trash bags as they seem to slip off the bag so easily.

The book is of a high quality even though it is a softcover.  The majority of recipes are a full page and accompanied by a full page color photo.  I'm not sure how many would have the ingredients for any of the recipes without having to go to the store for something and would not necessarily consider all the ingredients cheap.  I think with experience the recipes could be termed as "quick" but probably not the first time or those that don't cook a lot.  The book is worth it for the quality of the printing and using it for ideas to use with other recipes and mixing and matching and also for those that do want to prepare relatively quick meals but don't expect to have all the ingredients.

The taste by itself is great and is also great in smoothies or even my coffee, I use a teaspoon or less and it is just enough to add to the flavor of the coffee but not overpowering the coffee flavor.  It is a little gritty, to be expected, and does settle to the bottom so you will want to make sure you swirl the cup to get it all.As we get older our bodies do not process protein as easily so it is a good idea to supplement your diet with some protein powder, I like to use a different protein source everyday and Vega Sport Performance is a great addition to my rotation.  If you are also trying to lose weight protein powders are also very important because protein is what makes everything in your body function properly, diets can often deprive you of necessary protein.  As we get older it is harder for us to build and maintain muscle and don't forget the heart is a muscle also and supplementing with a protein powder can help with muscle development.

(sample supplied for review purposes)The pillowcase was a good size and even fit our largest pillows.  It worked great for her hair, she was very impressed with how nice her looked in the morning, no morning bedhead.  The pillowcase was not as soft as some silk pillowcases that we have but it was soft that was until I pointed out to her that the side she slept on was the anti-slip side. When she realized the other side was anti-slip and one silk and the slept on the silk side was when she really liked the pillow and then pointed out how well it did with her hair.  Recommended.

This is a beautiful loaf pan and looks great with all the other Christmas dishes we display and use in our dining room cabinet this time of year.  It arrived safely and in great condition.  It was the perfect size for us and the zucchini bread we make and did not have to alter the recipe.  The pan did not have any discoloration or crazing after baking with it, which was a concern for us since it is so beautiful.  Highly recommended.

The guide is big and colorful on high quality semi-glossy paper.  I'm not sure I would have titled it "2016" since it does not include this years sports games and other recent releases.  Many of the games included have been out for quite awhile, not necessarily a bad thing since they are most of the most popular games.  There is some info on games some may have not heard of such as "Cities Skylines" that Simcity fans should check out.I would consider the book more almanac than I would game guide, there are a lot of mostly subjective lists and really most of the game info is basic stuff.  The guide is dominated by bright and colorful pictures which take up most of the space.  When I selected the book the information said over 800 pages and even considered actually buying the book but now knowing that it is only 224 pages I knew the information would be basic stuff and would not be interested in buying it.  It is more suited for your young ones.

(sample supplied for review purposes)The headphones are a little small, I have what I consider an average size head and with the headphones fully extended they barely covered my ears.  The functions worked very nicely just remember that to turn the volume up or down you have to click the desired button for each level, holding the volume button down does nothing.  The battery time was as described.The sound quality left a little to be desired and wonder if some of this was the full speaker covering that has a grid of holes to let the sound through.  I have yet to find a pair of headphones that provided good sound with this design.  The highs and mids were not bad but the bass was barely passable, it was flat and clipped.  The sound was better at lower volumes.

The Santa figurine was adorable and it was larger than I was expecting.  The flickering light works great and is beautiful the way it looks coming through the slots.  The light comes with a battery already installed you just have to pull out the battery tab when you get it. Our only negative is the switch was very hard to turn on, I would suspect that it varies from figurine to figurine. We had to push very hard to get it completely over to the on position, it was easy to turn off.  If we had purchased it we would have exchanged it for another.

(sample supplied for review purposes)We didn't care for the spray bottle as far as applying it directly to the face and use a cotton ball instead, spraying the toner directly on the cotton ball and gently applying the toner that way.The results were great, it does firm the skin but leaves it soft and has a very refreshing feel but does not dry out the skin.  The short term results are immediately noticeable upon first use and continue with long term use.  The real benefit long term is the Vitamin C and you cannot underestimate the effect it does have , especially the effect it has on age related blemishes.  Recommended.

(sample supplied for review purposes)Comes with 2 sealed cloths, one for cleaning and one for drying.  I like that even the dry cloth came in a sealed packet, many others come with a dry cloth loosely packed with no protection from any debris that might get on it.  The screen protector was easy to put on and only had a couple bubbles that disappeared quickly.  Fit perfectly and there was no decrease in the touch screen performance.  We will see how well it protects and update accordingly.

(sample supplied for review purposes)The cream is like a lotion so we add a little on the finger and work it in, a little goes a long way.  What's nice is the pump bottle allows a little more control with the amount you want as opposed to a cream in a jar.  The cream tightened the skin while leaving it soft and had the feel of a brisk fall day on the skin.  It absorbs quickly and leaves no oily or greasy residue. Noticed results with the first use and continue to notice improvement after several weeks.  Highly recommended.

(sample supplied for review purposes)You will be hard-pressed to find a device it doesn't work with because of the 2 different output levels and as of yet I have not found a USB charging device it doesn't work with.  This is ideal for the person that often has several people in the car at the same time, since most cars now come with at least one charging port it has you covered when more than one person needs a charge but because of the two different charging levels it might be something you need even if you typically travel by yourself, especially if you are an Apple fan.  Even like the way it looks.  Practically an essential glove box accessory.  Good value.

Just kidding. Our mother did not want to spend a lot on a hearing aid so these were the perfect solution for her.  We tried several different kinds and this design from NewEar was the one she preferred, many different sellers sell the same design. They are better in isolated situations and don't work as well in situations with a lot of extraneous noise. The only problem is they are a one size fits all which means they are more suited for medium to larger ears.  Our mother has small ears, she always uses the small buds but in order for the ear piece to fit in her ear there is a considerable curve/bend in the wire and this inevitably means the wire breaks, she goes through one every 6 to 12 months.  The good news is that the price of these has dropped considerably over the last few years.Just wanted to add that there is a hard plastic piece that you attach the soft ear gel to, that hard plastic piece is supposed to be glued on, we have found sometimes we receive it where it is not glued on.  When you get your hearing aid make sure that hard plastic piece is glued on.

This is a high quality game on all fronts.  Great artwork on the cards.  Quality materials used in the production.  You can tell a lot of time was spent on and refining the rules.  Highly customizable by itself and with expansions.  Lots of fun.  If you are not familiar with CCGs(Collectible Card Games) and you really want to learn give it time, this is easily one of the best CCGs on the market and really sets itself apart from the others as far as its gameplay, you could almost say it is a next gen CCG.  Typically I am more of a Sci-Fi CCG fan, Warhammer 40K, but this was very enjoyable. Highly recommended.

(sample supplied for review purposes)Works great, easy push button function, have just used it on tomatoes so far but figure if it can easily handle tomatoes, it should do well on strawberries or other fruits.  Probably more suited for somebody that needs to core many tomatoes or strawberries but it does its job never the less.

(sample supplied for review purposes)Consider my rating 4 1/2 stars.The first thing I want to address is the charging problem some have and it has to do with one thing, it uses USB which requires it to be charged from a computer(trickle charge) and some outlet chargers. Some have mentioned that with this version and others they are only able to get about a half an hour to an hour worth of play time. If you charge it from a computer you will get 6 to 7 hours or more depending on what you are using it for.I really like the dark red metallic color, it is not just cool looking it is also easy to spot when you set it down.This unit has the 32 GB built in, there are other versions that have a micro SD card slot that come with a 16 GB SD card. So depending how much you want to do with it you will have to decide what is best for you but 32 GB internal storage is a lot and will be enough for most.Let's start with the packaging and honestly this might be my biggest negative but really didn't effect my rating. It comes in a two part clear plastic case wrapped in glued on cellophane. Don't try to remove the cellophane, take a knife and slice along the sides where the two pieces of plastic come together, slice along the two long sides and the bottom short side, you will feel your knife slightly enter the slot along the sides. By leaving the top side connected you will have a flip open case.The player itself fits my needs perfectly, mostly for walking and listening to music and audio books. I got over 4 hours of playing time using it for that and probably had more but decided to charge the player, I don't like to let the battery get to low. The player does so much more than play audio files, there are even 4 games included but watching video and playing games might not be the best things to use the player for because of the small screen size but you can, pictures and video quality were very good. You can also record what you are listening to on the radio to or use it as a voice recorder. The radio worked great and the reception was surprisingly good. My only real negative was the bass with the supplied ear buds was not very good even at the rock setting on the equalizer but I rarely get good bass out of ear buds, the bass was a lot better with an over the ear pair of headphones.The player was very intuitive, I never did look at the instructions and only encountered a few minor bumps in the road that I eventually figured out. The interface has a quaint old school pixelated look but really was a non issue for me. For my needs it was perfect and is very highly recommended for those with similar needs to mine.

The good about the iron is how fast it gets hot, it is easily the best iron we have ever used when it comes to how fast it gets hot, the days of waiting for your iron to get hot are over.  Another good thing about the iron is the steam and spritz function.  You can use the steam function in the horizontal or vertical position, so you can use it as wrinkle steamer for hanging garments.  The spritz function also works well for what I would describe as the ideal amount of water that comes out.  Ironing with the D3030 is a pleasure, it does its job well.The bad is putting water in the iron.  It has a little door you open to add the water, the problem is you have to add the water while the iron lays flat because you can't really add the water in the vertical position.  Another reason you need to add water in the horizontal position is the fill line is oriented for the horizontal position.  The problem with the fill line is it is on the dark opaque plastic so you practically need a flashlight to tell how much water you have added.  Obviously the problem with filling the tank in the horizontal position is the water gradually leaks out so once you are done filling you need to stand the iron up immediately.  Ultimately this is a minor annoyance that you get used to.  Once you have the water in everything works as it should.

(sample supplied for review purposes)Upon first opening the waist brace I noticed the strong neoprene smell, so you will probably want to hand wash it before you use it to help reduce the smell.  I am a size 39 and it was just long enough by three inches so if you are over a size 42 or larger you may not get it around enough to fit.  It works great and does reduce the stress on my lower back, I even took a nap wearing it and it stayed attached.  Was comfortable to wear standing or sitting down.  We will see how durable it but it does look pretty durable right now.

(sample supplied for review purposes)The best part for me is that it allows me to keep my beard during the hot summer months when I typically shave it off, it is like an aftershave for your beard, it does a great job of eliminating the itches I normally get at this time of year.  A little goes a long way when you apply it to your beard when it is damp, the mini travel bottle was enough for three treatments for me and my large beard.  Great conditioning and makes my wild beard really manageable and soft.  Highly recommended.
